name: Demon Survival (Swope Studios)
description:
Try to fall asleep. Beware of what may be in the room with you. 

Instructions: Hold right-click to fill the sleep meter in the top right corner before 5 AM. If you hear breathing, look to your left and right-click to flash your light. At the foot of your bed, right-click to reset the voodoo doll.

ATTENTION!: If you are prone to seizures or any sort of heart problem, it is not recommended to play this game. Swope Studios is not responsible for any health effects that you may develop from playing this game. 

Join the Discord: https://discord.gg/BMQwWWV6Ms

Follow the Twitter: Swope Studios (@SwopeStudios) / Twitter
